name: Unforeseen Consequences RTX
description:
My interpretation of C1A0 and C1A0D from Hlaf Life after the events of the resonance cascade. Made as an interactive environment and not a complete game. Music is from Black Mesa and composed by Joel Nielsen. Made in Unreal in 4 weeks. 

Included is both a version with raytracing enabled and disabled.

RTX requires a card that supports DXR from Nividia or AMD.

Recomended RTX2070 or better for ray tracing and GTX1070 or better without RTX.
